attributes.action: Encourage schools, hospitals, the emergency services and other government funded buildings to fly the British flag and have a picture of the reigning monarch visible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long now our culture has been surpressed and watered down. This isn't the fault (as some believe) of moaning foreigners, but because of the people in power who believe these people will be 'offended'. We should love and be proud of our nation and should show this in flag flying, national days, and through our monarch. Schools etc. should not feal fear in displaying love for our nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
